rows.label: bf04230100_0010
rows.name: After that, Tora hide out in Torigo city.

rows.label: bf04230100_0020
rows.name:
Making Hana based on blueprints and
ether furnace Dadapon left for Tora.

rows.label: bf04230100_0030
rows.name: Don't you have any idea who the attackers were?

rows.label: bf04230100_0040
rows.name:
Tora not know who, but they
definitely wanted to steal Kiku.

rows.label: bf04230100_0050
rows.name:
If it was Kiku they were after, how'd
she end up here in the Empire?

rows.label: bf04230100_0060
rows.name:
It looked like there were
imperial soldiers after her...

rows.label: bf04230100_0070
rows.name:
Tora have no idea...
But one thing is most confusing.

rows.label: bf04230100_0080
rows.name: What's that?

rows.label: bf04230100_0090
rows.name:
When bad guys attacked the lab,
Kiku was not finished.

rows.label: bf04230100_0100
rows.name:
There only one who could finish making Kiku...
Dadapon Tatezo!

rows.label: bf04230100_0110
rows.name: Which means...

rows.label: bf04230100_0120
rows.name: Tora's father must still be alive somewhere?

rows.label: bf04230100_0130
rows.name: Dadapon must be held captive by whoever using Kiku...

rows.label: bf04230100_0140
rows.name: You there! Don't move!

rows.label: bf04230100_0150
rows.name: [ML:undisp ]!

rows.label: bf04230100_0160
rows.name: Imperial soldiers...

rows.label: bf04230100_0170
rows.name: You!

rows.label: bf04230100_0180
rows.name:
It's been a while, 
Driver of the Heaven's Holy Grail.

rows.label: bf04230100_0190
rows.name:
Meleph-sama, she's the one.
That mechanical girl took down our squad!

rows.label: bf04230100_0200
rows.name: What?! Hang on a minute!

rows.label: bf04230100_0210
rows.name: Where the hell'd you get that idea?!

rows.label: bf04230100_0220
rows.name:
Unfortunately, they cannot tell
difference between Kiku and Hana.

rows.label: bf04230100_0230
rows.name: So...Rex, was it?

rows.label: bf04230100_0240
rows.name:
Rex, I'm very disappointed to find you
stooping to such lowly crimes.

rows.label: bf04230100_0250
rows.name:
Lowly crimes?! What the heck?!
I'm telling you, you've got the wrong guys!
